definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: The transversal muscle fibre was not cut off, so the integrality of bladder neck was keeped.
sentences.chinese: 術中不切斷膀胱頸橫行肌纖維，保持其完整性。

sentences.english: This means you have to utilize different muscle fibers which stimulate greater growth.
sentences.chinese: 這意味著你必須使用不同的肌纖維的刺激更大的發展。

sentences.english: The fiber types distribution in human adductor muscles and gluteus maximus was studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究內收肌羣和臀大肌的肌纖維型分佈。

sentences.english: Myofibroma is an uncommon neoplasm characterized by myofibroblastic proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 肌纖維瘤是一種非尋常的肌纖維母細胞增生性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Myofibroma is an uncommon neoplasm characterized by myofibroblastic proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 肌纖維瘤是一種非尋常的肌纖維母細胞增生性腫瘤。

sentences.english: Pathological examination revealed hyperaemia among myocardial fibers cardiac muscle fibers, part apomorphosis and edema of lung.
sentences.chinese: 病理觀察示心肌纖維間充血和局部變性，肺臟水腫。

sentences.english: When muscle fibers are damaged, the cells can begin leaking potassium and phosphorous into the bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 當肌纖維損傷後，破裂細胞中的鉀和磷泄漏入血液中。

sentences.english: Motor units comprise a motoneuron and the muscle fibers it innervates.
sentences.chinese: 運動單位由運動神經元及其支配的肌纖維組成。

sentences.english: The normal histologic appearance of prostate glands and surrounding fibromuscular stroma is shown here at high magnification.
sentences.chinese: 高倍鏡示正常前列腺和周圍的肌纖維間質。

sentences.english: Hypertrophy also allows the abnormally high pressure to be developed by a greater number of myofibrils.
sentences.chinese: 肥厚也可使大量肌纖維產生異常高的壓力。

sentences.english: For example, when an athlete trains, her muscle fibers break down.
sentences.chinese: 例如，運動員訓練時他的肌纖維會受損。

sentences.english: The relationship between the alteration of capllaries and the degree of muscle fibers degeneration was disscussed.
sentences.chinese: 血管病變程度與肌纖維變性程度呈平行關係。

sentences.english: Urea can increase the speed of the washing out process.
sentences.chinese: 脲能增加剛果紅從已經染色的肌纖維中洗脫的速率。

sentences.english: For example, muscle proteins of a certain shape connect to form a muscle fiber .
sentences.chinese: 舉個例子，某種形狀的肌肉蛋白連接起來形成肌纖維。
